page.title: 06Upottery's Farm Livestock 3
page.content:
{A Family of pigs. If you want a pig to farrow you put it with a boar for about a week then take the sow away.Put the sow in a shed on her own for about two-three months. She will start making her bed. That means she is ready to have her piglets.When she has finally finished her bed she will have up to twenty piglets.
{ Poultry} Some farms in the area also keep poultry.Quite a lot have a few chickens in the yard and it is often the children's job to collect the eggs.Other farms have ducks or geese and one even breeds pheasants.
